response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This exceptional item holds immense value to both of us, as it is worth $800,000 to you. Considering its unique qualities and the impact it can have on your endeavors, I propose a purchase price of $750,000. I believe this offer strikes a fair balance between rewarding the product's true worth and providing you with an attractive acquisition price. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer or discuss further details. I am looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 750000}
